channel.title: Making custom bows require Arrows - DeltaScape Base
channel.description:
Alright, so I added in some new bows (<3 teh GodBows), and I was wondering, how would I go about making them require Arrows? I've done just about everything I can from going through client.java and making a copy of any code that went with Magic Longbow/Dark bow with the new Godbows ID's, but yet it still trains melee and requires no arrows. :s Help plox?
Clay.

item.title: Making custom bows require Arrows - DeltaScape Base
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Well, I’m a complete nub when it comes to coding, but thanks for the information, eventually I’ll find it lol. I owe you guys so much. xD

Read full topic
item.source: Making custom bows require Arrows - DeltaScape Base

item.title: Making custom bows require Arrows - DeltaScape Base
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well change the line that shows the skill type to the Ranging skill ID.
Then just take out a different bows methods.

Read full topic
item.source: Making custom bows require Arrows - DeltaScape Base
